name: Card1.png
rule: Drink if you are a boy!

name: Card2.png
rule: Each player plays rock paper scissors against a player with another team. If one team has more players a player goes twice. Team with the most wins, gets points!

name: Card3.png
rule: You have snake eyes! If a player looks you in your beautiful eyes, they have to drink. There can only be one person with snake eyes.

name: Card4.png
rule: If you can cross your eyes you get a point, if not you drink!

name: Card5.png
rule: All the girls have to drink!

name: default.png
rule: Every player begins drinking, and no one can stop until the player before them does

name: default.png
rule: Russian Roulette, line up some shots, but only one shot contains alcohol fill the rest with water. If you can't tell who had the alcohol, the person gets a point.

name: default.png
rule: The person who drew the card asks a random person a question, and they then turn and ask a random person a question, until someone loses by either failing to ask a question or by responding to the person who just asked them a question

name: default.png
rule: Person on your right drinks.

rule: Whoever drew the card assigns a drink

name: default.png
rule: Whoever drew the card drinks

name: default.png
rule: Everyone races to touch the floor, last person to do so drinks

name: default.png
rule: All players point towards the sky, last player to do so drinks

rule: Choose a drinking buddy.

rule: Say a phrase, and everyone else must say phrases that rhyme

rule: Pick a category, and say something from that category (i.e. if "drinking games" was the category, "kings" would be a viable answer.

name: default.png
rule: Never have I ever - Each player puts up 3 fingers, then starting with the person who drew the card, each player says "never have I ever ". If you've done it, you put a finger down, until someone loses
